splash.title: NASAKA
splash.subtitle: IEBC
splash.description: Kora Iduka ria IEBC Ririri Hakuhi
splash.disclaimer: Ihira unyonyereri gwa handuko yawo ndiho ukorere iduka ria IEBC ririri hakuhi na ukorere inzira ya kugenda.
splash.locationBlockedDescription: Tondeka uihire handuko kuri ivitari via browser yago na ugakoshe hangi

search.placeholder: Carira maduka ga IEBC na county, constituency, kana handuko...
search.noMatchQuery: Ntamaduka galingana na "{{query}}". Geria kucaria kindu kingi.
search.noOfficesInArea: Ntamaduka ga IEBC gakorerwe mulugongo lwago.

bottomSheet.locationAccessDesc: Ihira unyonyereri gwa handuko ndiho ukorere ivei ria rugendo, ukorere inzira kuuma handuko yawo ya riumuri, na ukorere inzira ya hakuhi yienda kuliduka lino.
bottomSheet.confirmOffice: Avandu vanokona kuziiza iduka lino ni rio
bottomSheet.within500m: Ni nthi ure mita 500 kuuma kuliduka
bottomSheet.distanceAway: Uri mita {{distance}} kure. Tondeka uhendehere mita {{maxDistance}} kuuma kuliduka ndiho uziize.
bottomSheet.confirmationFailed: Kwaga kutuma kuziza. Tondeka ugerie hangi.
bottomSheet.locationPermissionRequired: Unyonyereri gwa handuko nithi ndiho uziize. Tondeka uihire handuko na ugerie hangi.
bottomSheet.tapForGoogleMaps: Kanya iduka ndiho ukorere inzira ya Google Maps.

layers.standardDesc: Rora ria map ya inzira tsia kawaida
layers.iebcOfficesDesc: Handuko tsoosi tsia maduka ga IEBC mulugongo lwoosi lwa Kenya
layers.constituenciesDesc: Imiriri ya Parliament na vuhoro mulugongo lwoosi lwa Kenya nduha na IEBC. Kiumbe kimwe nikionyesia constituency imwe na kode yako na eliira ryako.
layers.healthcareFacilitiesDesc: Ugai gwa maduka ga uvulahi mulugongo lwoosi (data ningi sana - yinokona kuhetekera incibiti ningi)
layers.counties: Data ya Vatonji va Counties Kenya
layers.countiesDesc: Ugai gwa imiriri ya counties mulugongo lwoosi
layers.myLocationDesc: Onya handuko yago ya riumuri muri map
layers.aboutLayersDesc: Garanya tsilayeri ndiho ugaranye rora ria map. Unokona kuvanga tsilayeri nyingi tsia data na maps nyaanja ndiho ukorere uvumanyi vunzuri.

contribute.title: Sihira Handuko ya Iduka Yeraya
contribute.description: Tudeera tukorere maduka goosi ga IEBC mulugongo lwoosi lwa Kenya muli kusihira data ya handuko sinene.
contribute.googleMapsPlaceholder: Tupia link ya Google Maps kana amanomero
contribute.uploadEvidenceDesc: Ichifwani chia iduka, amalagizo, kana lugongo luriri hakuhi niluteeraga uziizi
contribute.dragDropOrClick: Kurura na uleke kana ukanze ndiho utose
contribute.movePin: Kurura pin ndiho ugaranye handuko tena
contribute.submissionSuccessDesc: Sihiro ryago ritumirwe na rirarorwa ni avarori.
contribute.submissionNote: Menya: Uziizi gwa avandu guiteeraga data sinene. Sandiza muno!
contribute.errorLocation: Tondeka uhire amanomero ga handuko ya iduka
contribute.errorInvalidCoordinates: Amanomero gasiri ga tena. Tondeka urore latitude na longitude.
contribute.errorSubmissionFailed: Kwaga kutuma sihiro. Tondeka ugerie hangi.
contribute.errorLocationPermission: Unyonyereri gwa handuko gwaniirwe. Tondeka uihire handuko.
contribute.errorLocationFailed: Kwaga kukora handuko. Tondeka uhandike amanomero na mivoko.
contribute.parseError: Utaari musiri sinene. Tondeka utupia link ya Google Maps sinene kana amanomero.

uber.uberXDesc: Rugendo rwa vuriumuri na ivei nini
